snippet: Authentiques Past and Present is stuffed with baubles new and old to help patrons decorate during the holiday season.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Authentiques Past and Present, Chelsea shop offering vintage Christmas decorations year-round, along with other antique wares.
